searchConfig.support: Only support Chinese and English, numbers and special characters on the keyboard
searchConfig.repeatName: Search policy configuration name already exists, please re-enter
searchConfig.successTip: You can view or test the configuration in the configuration policy list
searchConfig.noConfig: The current configuration strategy does not exist!
searchConfig.noAuth: You currently don't have the relevant permissions for this knowledge graph.
searchConfig.hasChange: The operation failed. The current knowledge graph has been modified and cannot be configured!
searchConfig.changeTip: The content of the current configuration has not been saved yet. You will not be able to restore the configuration content after switching. Please be careful.
searchConfig.noSelectConfigErr: Please select any knowledge graph search configuration and conduct a cognitive search
searchConfig.existTip: Are you sure you want to exit the current operation?
searchConfig.existContent: Configuration content cannot be restored after exit, please be careful.
searchConfig.existExploreTip: You will not be able to resume exploratory analysis once you exit, so be careful.
searchConfig.delTip: Are you sure you want to delete this search policy configuration?
searchConfig.delContent: Once the search policy configuration is deleted and cannot be retrieved, be careful!
searchConfig.saveSuccess: Save successfully! You can apply/view in saved search configurations.
searchConfig.pleaseSelect: Please select/enter the knowledge graph before configuring the search rules.
searchConfig.scopeTip: Search scope refers to searching extensively through specified entity and relationship classes when searching extensively
searchConfig.resTip: Search results are the final results that appear after a search traversal
searchConfig.graphNoExist: Operation failed, the knowledge graph has been deleted!
searchConfig.searchTip1: Please select any policy configuration before entering keywords to quickly find
searchConfig.searchTip2: or click search directly to view
searchConfig.noConfigTip1: Please select any knowledge graph and complete the search rule configuration
searchConfig.noGraphTip: Click | [create] | button to start building the Map of Knowledge. The Cognitive Search will not be available until the Map is built.
searchConfig.noGraphTipByNormal: Please contact the knowledge network administrator to create a 「policy configuration」 before you can use the 「cognitive search」 function
